caption.p: Structure of imports and exports of plant material by main EU and Mediterranean basin countries (2019) (∗). (∗) Source: Our processing on UNCOMTRADE data, subcodes 0601 = Bulbs, tubers, tuberous roots, corms, crowns and rhizomes; dormant, in growth or in flower; chicory plants and roots other than roots of heading. 0602 = Plants, live; n.e.s. in heading n. 0601 (including their roots) cutting and slips; mushroom spawn. 0603 = Flowers; cut flowers and flower buds of a kind suitable for bouquets or for ornamental purposes, fresh, dried, dyed, bleached, impregnated or otherwise prepared. 0604 = Foliage, branches and other parts of plants, without flowers buds, and glasses, mosses and lichens; suitable for bouquets or for ornamental purposes, fresh, dried, dyed, bleached, impregnated etc.
